ram.description: Maximum number of RAM memory used by the program. (optional)
ram.title: The Ram schema.

nb_threads.description: Maximum number of threads use by the program. (optional)
nb_threads.title: The Nb_threads schema.

output_dates_filename.description: Path to output_dates, containing all dates you want in the output. (optional, by default step between two dates is one day)
output_dates_filename.title: The output_dates_filename schema.
